name: DrupalRequirements
short_description:
These are the files that are required for a base installation of an Apache and PHP server to host a Drupal website. 

These files will ensure that you have the correct versions to ensure that you have a working server. These packages will be used in conjunction with the installation instructions Install PHP, Apache, MYSQL for Drual 6.3 installation  

http://awssolutions.wordpress.com/2013/07/16/install-php-apache-mysql-for-drual-6-3-installation
summary: The files that are required for Drupal installation
